product_name: Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Wheel - Front
long_description: Weighing in at 715g, the highly anticipated Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Front Wheel offers serious cyclists the speed and durability of 2 yrs. of testing and design in top-performance carbon.
short_description: Weighing in at 715g, the highly anticipated Zipp 404 Firecrest Carbon Clincher Front Wheel offers serious cyclists the speed and durability of 2 yrs. of testing and design in top-performance carbon.
